name: Text-to-Audio With Ads
author: Kuzalab Creatives

sections.description:
Vocalize utilizes AI to convert Publishers’ text into playable audio for easy and convenient on page consumption. No dev work required, this solution generates brand new revenue while also being an amazing value add to publishers’ offerings.

Third-Party Service Disclosure

This plugin relies on a third-party service, Vocalize.africa, to convert text into audio. When you create, update, or delete a post, data such as the post’s title, content, author name, publication date, and featured image is sent to Vocalize’s API to enable the conversion of the posted Article into Audio.

Service Used:
– Vocalize (https://vocalize.africa/)

Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
– Vocalize Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

Please review these documents to ensure that your use of the service complies with your local laws and regulations.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. See the LICENSE file for more details.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/text-to-audio-with-ads directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Settings->Text to Audio Settings screen to configure your API Keys.
sections.faq:
1. How do I create API keys for use with this plugin?

Visit wwww.vocalize.africa, register as a Publisher to generate your API keys

  1. Does this plugin work with custom post types?
    Yes, this plugin works with all post types, including custom post types.

  2. How does the plugin convert text to audio?
    The plugin sends post data to the Vocalize service, which processes the content and generates an audio file. The audio player is then embedded in the post.
sections.changelog:
1.1.6

  • Added support for all post types.
  • Updated readme to include third-party service disclosure.
